title: The lands which are affected by the restrictions of High Energy Material Research Laboratory or provisions of other Central or State Government Acts, forms the part of the entire land, then FSI of such affected land may be allowed to be utilised on the remaining contiguous land
clause_text: The lands which are affected by the restrictions of High Energy Material Research Laboratory or provisions of other Central or State Government Acts, forms the part of the entire land, then FSI of such affected land may be allowed to be utilised on the remaining contiguous land. However, sub-division of such land shall not be allowed.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
